27 inline tColor FromARGB( uint8_t a, uint8_t r, uint8_t g, uint8_t b ) { return ((((uint32_t)a) << 24) | (((uint32_t)r) <<16 ) | (((uint32_t)g) << 8) | ((uint32_t)b)); }
28 inline tColor FromBGRA( uint8_t b, uint8_t g, uint8_t r, uint8_t a ) { return ((((uint32_t)b) << 24) | (((uint32_t)g) <<16 ) | (((uint32_t)r) << 8) | ((uint32_t)a)); }

34 // Dummy class for colour look up table
35 class NAVICO_SDK_EXPORT tRadarColourLookUpTable
36 {
37 private:
38  tColor *m_pColourLookup;
39 
40 public:
41  tRadarColourLookUpTable() : m_pColourLookup( nullptr ) { }
42 
43  //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
48  //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
49  inline tColor GetColour( uint32_t index ) { assert( index < 256 ); return m_pColourLookup[index]; }
50 
51 protected:
52  inline void SetLookUpTablePointer( tColor *pLookUpTable ) { m_pColourLookup = pLookUpTable; }
53 };
